occupation: Comedian, television host, actress, writer, producer
achievements: Won numerous Emmy Awards and Peabody Awards for her talk show 'The Ellen DeGeneres Show'
First openly gay host of a major daytime talk show
Best known for her role as Meredith Grey on the medical drama 'Grey's Anatomy'
One of the highest-paid actresses in television
Nominated for a Tony Award for her Broadway performance in 'The Normal Heart'
Starred in films such as ' Diner', 'Switch' and 'Sea of Love'
